author: Source: Lethbridge Herald
title: Drogbaa s free-kick goal, Busha s late save help Impact beat Rapids 1-0 - Lethbridge Herald
text:
Didier Drogba's scored on a 30-yard free kick, Evan Bush made a late diving save and the Montreal Impact beat the Colorado Rapids 1-0 on Saturday. Drogba bent it around the wall and inside the right post for his team-leading ninth goal in nine appearances this season.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Lethbridge Herald.
